channel.title: >Urgent< Java help to play servers!
channel.description:
Hello there ladies and gents. I'm having some trouble w/ Java and I came here to see if someone w/ more knowledge can help me out.
Recenetely, I was told by an admin of a server to download the latest JRE (7.2). It has completely screwed me over.
Due to my inept Java skills, I deleted everything Java related that is x86 thinking that I could update my whole Java in all.
Well, know, I can't do anything really. Here is what I am experiencing.
>I'll use Project Catastrophe as an example.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/li99g.png[/img] [U][I]^As you can see here, when I first load up the page no Java singal shows up. All that shows up is "Install Plug-in".
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/bews9k.png[/img] ^I click the "Install Plug-in" button. Everything looks normal, just getting a small updater for the client.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/20ur09h.png[/img] ^After clicking the button, A pop-up (blocked) comes up on the screen. It also tells me to refresh my page.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/240x8cm.png[/img] ^.. And I'm back to where I started. Rinse and repeat.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34qjzfl.png[/img] ^Here is my JRE (w/ all of the JRE 7 files inside) on Java within my Program Files.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mwsf1l.png[/img] ^Here is what my Java looks like within my x86 Program Files. ( I put the last two screenies there just in case it might be important).[/I][/U]
If anyone can offer up a little help, or just anything they know (I'm desperate), than please gimme a hand!
*I do use google chrome. *Already posted on RL forum, closed within 7 mins. Hoping for some more cooperation here.

item.description:

did you try getting the plugin at oracles website?

2zz3juw.png640×512

item.title: >Urgent< Java help to play servers!
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“Help Pl0x 88880, post:9, topic:426354”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529046.msg3859700#msg3859700 date=1324594731]
Uninstall and reinstall Java starting with JDK and then JRE. Also, make sure your Variables are correctly set.
[/quote]
Will do, thanks.

re-read my post then you tell me

I can’t; All that comes up is “Install Plug-in” (Refer to the screen shots ITT).[/quote]
did you try getting the plugin at oracles website?

Read full topic

@Help_Pl0x_88880 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Uninstall and reinstall Java starting with JDK and then JRE. Also, make sure your Variables are correctly set.

Will do, thanks. [Extra: Does it matter whether the Program Files are x86 or not?]

lemme_winks_:

re-read my post then you tell me

I can’t; All that comes up is “Install Plug-in” (Refer to the screen shots ITT).

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Help Pl0x 88880, post:6, topic:426354”]@ Rocket: It wasn’t at you. I threw it in to maybe get some laughs, but I don’t think you picked up the correct reception.

@ Lemme: What are you talking about…?[/quote]

Uninstall and reinstall Java starting with JDK and then JRE. Also, make sure your Variables are correctly set.

item.title: >Urgent< Java help to play servers!
item.dc:creator: @Help_Pl0x_88880 Help Pl0x 88880
item.description:
@Help_Pl0x_88880 wrote:

Hello there ladies and gents. I’m having some trouble w/ Java and I came here to see if someone w/ more knowledge can help me out.

Recenetely, I was told by an admin of a server to download the latest JRE (7.2). It has completely screwed me over.

Due to my inept Java skills, I deleted everything Java related that is x86 thinking that I could update my whole Java in all.

Well, know, I can’t do anything really. Here is what I am experiencing.

I’ll use Project Catastrophe as an example.

li99g.png640×512

[U][I]^As you can see here, when I first load up the page no Java singal shows up. All that shows up is “Install Plug-in”.

bews9k.png640×512

^I click the “Install Plug-in” button. Everything looks normal, just getting a small updater for the client.

20ur09h.png640×512

^After clicking the button, A pop-up (blocked) comes up on the screen. It also tells me to refresh my page.

240x8cm.png640×512

^… And I’m back to where I started. Rinse and repeat.

34qjzfl.png640×512

^Here is my JRE (w/ all of the JRE 7 files inside) on Java within my Program Files.

2mwsf1l.png640×512

^Here is what my Java looks like within my x86 Program Files. ( I put the last two screenies there just in case it might be important).[/I][/U]

If anyone can offer up a little help, or just anything they know (I’m desperate), than please gimme a hand!

*I do use google chrome.
*Already posted on RL forum, closed within 7 mins. Hoping for some more cooperation here.

Read full topic
